data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LGuCG-qOgkUQ7kNvgERfQv8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCli_o447VFO7GjWhmIG7_2P85ByK9Q6DNhVFSVSMjuQA&oe=66B89EB7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=15InYS2JR1sQ7kNvgGWkpyh&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBBSNQXRGYQV_8-xUICHioxISS3tCKSTyoSxqLEC6LGMg&oe=66B8AC52)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=bWN5CHNYcqoQ7kNvgGFdhpK&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAuMWxplt74A1et7VO42YNRBP4oLoL3aBlYDI9Jk46sOg&oe=66B89789)
